ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s time for the main event! The Gorgeous Ladies of Wrestling are turning heel for one night only—but just like any good wrestling match, nothing is quite as it seems! Will the Star Primas come out on top? Or will GLOW come out swinging with a surprise upset?!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Hannah Templer | 1-2 | RI-A | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover A | Nicoletta Baldari | 3 | RI-B | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover B | Jenn St-Onge | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-25 14:32:38. [CVDB714565]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Hannah Templer, Jenn St-Onge, Nicoletta Baldari
ComicInfo.Editor: Bobby Curnow, Elizabeth Brei, Megan Brown
